title: "Unable to connect to chat"
body: Ever since the crash last night, I have been unable to connect to chat in the lobby and in champ select. I have repaired my client, restarted the computer several times and still no luck. Anyone else?

replies.body: I'm having the same problem. It's been like this for the last few days already, but I haven't played since last weekend, so it might have been about the same time as your problem started.
